Articles.Content:
I started a new career mode in 1.1. I put a lot of time/effort into my ships and missions, so i thought i might as well share them. I mean, someone might like them, right? I shall update this thread with my impending advancement of progress.

Mission 1: Get Somewhere mk1

A seven-stage booster where each stage burns the previous one away. It can get suborbital. I could make it more versatile, but it has trouble slowing down fast enough in the atmosphere.

Mission 2: Get Somewhere mk2

Gets all the way to orbit with lots of science left over.

Mission 3: Get Somewhere mk3

A mun flyby vehicle. Has a lot of trouble aerobraking.

Mission 4: Stylish Tourism Mk1

this low-tech little dodad gets four tourists to suborbital space, and lands them safely with no more than 12 gees of stress. My own "sportier" version of the XCOR lynx

Mission 5: Mun Lander 1 (i know i'm so original with my names)

A simple but effective mun lander with only 30 parts. I had to cut quite a few corners to get it to work. It lands on its heat radiators.But overall it looks quite utilitarian, and has delta v to spare, so i'm quite proud of it. P.S. Radiators are op when it comes to aerobraking

Mission 6: Minmus 1

A great minmus lander with tons of delta V. You could visit every biome on minmus with it if you wanted.

 

Next up: stylish tourism mk2 and duna mission

Or taking requests! Is there something you want for career mode? I could probably make it for you

Edited April 26, 2016 by quasarrgames
I'm really digging the design of that first mun lander. Love the asymmetry of it!
Heh, props to you for actually sharing this stuff. I'm too embarrassed by my early Career derpmobiles to even save them, let alone let other people see them xD

Looong hiatus heh

But i'm back with more career ships!

Mission 6: Mirage mv4

It's a very early-career SSTO. It's got less than 30 parts and 18 tons, and it can take off from the t1 runway. Has just barely enough fuel to get to orbit with 4 passengers.

Mission 7: Progress D1 (TLV launch)

This is the Thorin SSTO launch vehicle. Gets an orange tank to orbit with just enough fuel to deorbit and land. It has a 14% payload fraction, which isn't bad for a rocket SSTO. It is, however, very susceptible to high-drag payloads.

What's it carrying?

The first part of the Progress D1, an interplanetary cruiser bound for Duna. Currently it's just the drive/hab section. It still needs a lander and spare fuel tanks, and the it'll be good to go.

 

Edited June 4, 2016 by quasarrgames
oOh, nice. Looking forward to the cruiser

14 hours ago, EVA_Reentry/Strangelove II said:

oOh, nice. Looking forward to the cruiser

Here you go!

This is what it looks like ever since i launched Mission 8: Progress DL1 + fuel (TLV Launch)

It also has a small rover for driving around on duna. It was quite a stretch to fit everything onto one booster, but it worked. Just barely.

I wasn't having any luck making the mirage usable, so instead i decided to make something more fun.

Mission 9: Maston Mini Shuttle

This is my first successful shuttle, and i'm kind of proud of it. It was quite hard to balance its thrust properly, and recovery is dubious. Still, it's great for crew transfer, rescue missions, or bringing a small payload to orbit, like this one did.

 

Gonna do more tourism next.
